parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Genitive Masculine Plural
str2: Strengthened for a primary edo; used only in certain tenses, the rest being supplied by phago; to eat.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: (a) I receive, get, (b) I take, lay hold of.
Bread, a loaf, food. From airo; bread or a loaf.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: (lit: I speak well of) I bless; pass: I am blessed. From a compound of eu and logos; to speak well of, i.e. to bless.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To break (in pieces), break bread. A primary verb; to break.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To offer, give; I put, place. A prolonged form of a primary verb; to give.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Answer, bid, bring word, command. A primary verb; to speak or say.

parse: Verb - Aorist Imperative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: (a) I receive, get, (b) I take, lay hold of.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: I am, exist. The first person singular present indicative; a prolonged form of a primary and defective verb; I exist.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 1st Person Singular
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
Body, flesh; the body of the Church. From sozo; the body, used in a very wide application, literally or figuratively.
